00022 #ifndef _Record_h
00023 #define _Record_h
00024 
00025 #include "VRTObject.h"
00026 #include "VRTMath.h"
00027 #include "MetadataBlock.h"
00028 #include "TimeStamp.h"
00029 #include "InetAddress.h"
00030 #include "UUID.h"
00031 #include "HasFields.h"
00032 #include <vector>
00033 #include <string.h>    // required for memcpy(..) on GCC4.4/libc6 2.11.1
00034 
00035 namespace vrt {
00037   class Record : public VRTObject, public HasFields {
00039     private:   bool         strictEquality;
00041     protected: vector<char> buf;
00042 
00044     public: Record (const Record &r);
00045 
00051     public: Record (int32_t len, bool strictEquality=true);
00052 
00054     public: inline virtual bool isNullValue () const {
00055       for (size_t i = 0; i < buf.size(); i++) {
00056         if (buf[i] != 0) return false;
00057       }
00058       return true;
00059     }
00060 
00064     public: inline virtual void readBytes  (void *buffer) const {
00065       memmove(buffer, &buf[0], buf.size());
00066     }
00067 
00071     public: inline virtual void writeBytes (const void *buffer) {
00072       memmove(&buf[0], buffer, buf.size());
00073     }
00074 
00076     public: inline virtual int32_t getByteLength () const {
00077       return (int32_t)buf.size();
00078     }
00079 
00081     protected: virtual void setByteLength (int32_t len, int32_t off=-1);
00082 
00086     public: inline virtual string toString () const {
00087       return "";
00088     }
00089 
00090     using VRTObject::equals;
00091     public: virtual bool equals (const VRTObject &o) const;
00092 
00094     // PACK/UNPACK METHODS
00096 
00097     protected: inline void packByte      (int32_t off, int8_t              val                   ) { buf[off] = val; }
00099     protected: inline void packShort     (int32_t off, int16_t             val                   ) { VRTMath::packShort(    buf, off, val); }
00101     protected: inline void packInt       (int32_t off, int32_t             val                   ) { VRTMath::packInt(      buf, off, val); }
00103     protected: inline void packLong      (int32_t off, int64_t             val                   ) { VRTMath::packLong(     buf, off, val); }
00105     protected: inline void packFloat     (int32_t off, float               val                   ) { VRTMath::packFloat(    buf, off, val); }
00107     protected: inline void packDouble    (int32_t off, double              val                   ) { VRTMath::packDouble(   buf, off, val); }
00109     protected: inline void packBoolNull  (int32_t off, boolNull            val                   ) { VRTMath::packBoolNull( buf, off, val); }
00111     protected: inline void packBoolean   (int32_t off, bool                val                   ) { VRTMath::packBoolean(  buf, off, val); }
00113     protected: inline void packAscii     (int32_t off, string              val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packAscii(    buf, off, val, len); }
00115     protected: inline void packUTF8      (int32_t off, string              val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packUTF8(     buf, off, val, len); }
00117     protected: inline void packUTF8      (int32_t off, wstring             val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packUTF8(     buf, off, val, len); }
00119     protected: inline void packMetadata  (int32_t off, MetadataBlock       val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packMetadata( buf, off, val, len); }
00121     protected: inline void packBytes     (int32_t off, const vector<char> &val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packBytes(    buf, off, val, len); }
00123     protected: inline void packBytes     (int32_t off, void               *val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packBytes(    buf, off, val, len); }
00125     protected: inline void packTimeStamp (int32_t off, const TimeStamp    &val, IntegerMode epoch) { VRTMath::packTimeStamp(buf, off, val, epoch); }
00127     protected: inline void packInetAddr  (int32_t off, const InetAddress  &val                   ) { VRTMath::packInetAddr( buf, off, val); }
00129     protected: inline void packUUID      (int32_t off, const UUID         &val                   ) { VRTMath::packUUID(     buf, off, val); }
00130 
00132     protected: inline int8_t        unpackByte      (int32_t off                        ) const { return buf[off]; }
00134     protected: inline int16_t       unpackShort     (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackShort(    buf, off); }
00136     protected: inline int32_t       unpackInt       (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackInt(      buf, off); }
00138     protected: inline int64_t       unpackLong      (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackLong(     buf, off); }
00140     protected: inline float         unpackFloat     (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackFloat(    buf, off); }
00142     protected: inline double        unpackDouble    (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackDouble(   buf, off); }
00144     protected: inline boolNull      unpackBoolNull  (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackBoolNull( buf, off); }
00146     protected: inline bool          unpackBoolean   (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackBoolean(  buf, off); }
00148     protected: inline string        unpackAscii     (int32_t off,            int32_t len) const { return VRTMath::unpackAscii(    buf, off, len); }
00150     protected: inline wstring       unpackUTF8      (int32_t off,            int32_t len) const { return VRTMath::unpackUTF8(     buf, off, len); }
00152     protected: inline MetadataBlock unpackMetadata  (int32_t off,            int32_t len) const { return VRTMath::unpackMetadata( buf, off, len); }
00154     protected: inline vector<char>  unpackBytes     (int32_t off,            int32_t len) const { return VRTMath::unpackBytes(    buf, off, len); }
00156     protected: inline void*         unpackBytes     (int32_t off, void *val, int32_t len) const { return VRTMath::unpackBytes(    buf, off, val, len); }
00158     protected: inline TimeStamp     unpackTimeStamp (int32_t off, IntegerMode epoch     ) const { return VRTMath::unpackTimeStamp(buf, off, epoch); }
00160     protected: inline InetAddress   unpackInetAddr  (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackInetAddr( buf, off); }
00162     protected: inline UUID          unpackUUID      (int32_t off                        ) const { return VRTMath::unpackUUID(     buf, off); }
00164     protected:        bool          unpackBit       (int32_t off,            int32_t bit) const;
00165 
00167     protected: boolNull getStateEventBit (int32_t off, int32_t enable, int32_t indicator) const;
00168 
00170     // Implement HasFields
00172     public: virtual int32_t   getFieldCount () const;
00173     public: virtual string    getFieldName  (int32_t id) const;
00174     public: virtual ValueType getFieldType  (int32_t id) const;
00175     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00176     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
00177   };
